remarks: An atom is covered by its join with a different atom.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)
statement:
cvlatcvr1.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cvlatcvr1.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvlatcvr1.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cvlatcvr1 $p |- ( ( ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. CvLat ) /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> ( P =/= Q <-> P C ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) $.
